# PlainRecalls — Product Recall Search Engine
> Search 85,000+ product recalls from FDA, CPSC, NHTSA, and USDA

## What This Site Contains
- Product recall records from 4 U.S. federal agencies
- Search by product name, brand, keyword, or recall number
- Browse by agency (FDA Food, FDA Drug, FDA Device, CPSC, NHTSA)
- Browse by category (Food, Drugs, Medical Devices, Vehicles, Children, Electronics, etc.)
- Manufacturer recall histories
- Year-by-year recall archives
- Rankings of most recalled companies

## Data Sources
- FDA openFDA API (food, drug, device enforcement)
- CPSC SaferProducts.gov API
- NHTSA vehicle safety recall data
- USDA FSIS recall data (when available)

## Key Pages
- /recent — Latest recalls
- /agency — Browse by agency
- /category — Browse by category
- /manufacturer — Browse by company
- /rankings — Most recalled companies and years
- /search — Full-text recall search
- /api/search?q=keyword — JSON search API
